Class picture.ValueMap 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----picture.PicPipe
           |
           +----picture.ValueMap
public class ValueMap
extends PicPipe
This pipeline gets a double and returns a double based on a piecewise linear function. The function is formed by linear interpolation of a list of (x,y) pairs. If the value exactly matches one or more x values, it takes the first one. The (x,y) pairs should be sorted with increasing x values.

This code is (c) 1996 Leemon Baird <leemon@cs.cmu.edu>, http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~baird
The source and object code may be redistributed freely. If the code is modified, please state so in the comments.

Version:
1.0, 20 April 96
Author:
Leemon Baird
